content: **17 march 2018** - a new updated written version of this pattern with many photos was added **yarn suggestions ** i recommend a cotton yarn for this pattern that is suitable for hook 3 0 - 3 5 mm fingering the coaster in the pictures is made with scheepjes catona color 179 385 and 393 **hook ** 3 0 - 3 5 mm **size ** 10 - 11 cm in diameter depending on yarn and hook size for more crochet inspiration and patterns visit my blog https //mijocrochet se
